hero.title: Pradhan Mantri Kusum Yojana
hero.subtitle: Solar Power for Every Farm
hero.description: Empowering farmers with clean energy. Get 90% government subsidy on solar pumps and enjoy 24-hour electricity for irrigation.

highlights.title: Key Benefits of the Scheme
highlights.subtitle: Why farmers are choosing solar pumps under Kusum Yojana

subsidy.title: 90% Subsidy
subsidy.description: Government pays 90% of the total cost. Farmers pay only 10% upfront.

electricity.title: 24-Hour Power
electricity.description: Uninterrupted electricity supply for irrigation without dependency on grid.

income.title: Extra Income
income.description: Sell surplus electricity to power companies and earn additional income.

eco.title: Eco-Friendly
eco.description: Reduce diesel and petrol usage. Contribute to a greener environment.

about.title: About Submersible Pump Yojana
about.intro: The PM Kusum (Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyaan) Yojana is a government initiative to help farmers access reliable and affordable solar power for agricultural purposes.

objective.title: Objective of the Scheme
objective.content: The scheme aims to provide 24-hour power supply in villages by generating electricity on farmers' land. With this initiative, farmers can reduce their dependence on diesel and kerosene oil, leading to significant cost savings and environmental benefits.

benefits.title: Benefits of Solar Pump
benefits.item2: Direct subsidy transfer to farmer's bank account
benefits.item3: Utilize barren land for solar power generation
benefits.item5: Earn by selling excess power to grid

components.title: Components of Kusum Yojana
components.a: Component A: Setting up 10,000 MW decentralized ground/stilt mounted grid-connected solar power plants
components.b: Component B: Installation of 20 lakh standalone solar agricultural pumps
components.c: Component C: Solarisation of 15 lakh existing grid-connected agricultural pumps
